name: It All Started with An Explosion
name_original: It All Started with An Explosion
description:
It All Started with An Explosion

The egg-quisite story through animations and microgames about how a planet was created and the egg-volution of the egg race.

CREDITS:

  • GRAPHIC DESIGN: Dang Ngoc Phuong Thuy a.k.a Chloe
  • PROJECT OWNER: Le Pham Hoang An
  • PROGRAMMING: Le Pham Hoang An

SPECIAL THANKS TO:

SOUND EFFECT: StudioKolomna, Lexin Music, Alex MakeMusic and pixabay

Fullscreen mode is recommended while running the game.
